message: I'm excited to offer you this incredible opportunity to purchase a unique product. I believe it's a great fit for you, and I'm willing to start with a competitive price. I'm offering the product to you for $11500.
Thanks for the offer, Alice. I appreciate your enthusiasm, but $11500 is still a bit higher than I'm comfortable with. I'm willing to pay $10500 for the product.  Let me know what you think.

I understand that $10500 is a bit lower than my initial offer, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $11000. I think this is a fair price considering the value it will bring to you.

Alice, I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but $11000 is still a bit steep for me. I'm ready to purchase the product if you can come down to $10750. This is a fair price that reflects the value of the product and allows us to reach a mutually beneficial agreement.

I appreciate your persistence, Bob, and I'm willing to make another adjustment. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $11250. I think this price reflects the value of the product and is a fair compromise.

Alice, I appreciate you continuing to work with me on this. I'm still a bit hesitant at $11250. I'm ready to close the deal right now if you can bring the price down to $11000. This is a fair price that allows us both to walk away happy.

I'm starting to feel like we're getting close, Bob. I'm willing to meet you at $11000, but I'm not willing to go any lower than that. I'm thinking we can meet in the middle at $11250, but I'm willing to compromise on that. Let me try one last time to meet you at $11000.
